name: Intermediate Portuguese
description: This course will bring together Portuguese grammar and language skills into a useful and practical framework, in order to develop students' skills to communicate in an accurate, effective, and informed manner within a variety of socio-cultural situations. Besides introducing new grammar topics corresponding to the intermediate level, it also includes a grammar review with extra work on vocabulary acquisition. Focuses on comprehension, development of a greater complexity in students' written and oral productions, and gaining a better understanding of Portuguese-speaking cultures.
